thread.title: Julia
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Julia

author: Julia
title: Julia
text: The towels smelled mildewed needs more blinds around the hot tub so that the old man down the hill will stop staring at us. Jets in hot tub hardly worked. Dishes some were dirty. Fire place is barely working. Then when I went to the office to get more towels. She said they would bring them nobody showed up. Cabin is nice but not the best experience. We usually rent from Auntie Bellems. They are a little pricey now I see why.
